alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 7:46PM MST until February 15 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of light snow. Localized small bands of moderate snow possible. Additional snow accumulations of an inch or so over the lower elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Pueblo county. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
